document_data.name: Thuvauvyn Nathalanorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Thuvauvyn Nathalanorn''' was a [[baelnorn lich]] in [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Activities: Thuvauvyn was the guardian of [[House Nathalanorn]]'s crypt.
document_data.History: In [[1487 DR]], Thuvauvyn appeared to stop the [[shadovar]] agent [[Helgore Ulitarathulm]]. However, after a long and fierce battle, Helgore prevailed, destroying Thuvauvyn.
